# During Stay - Guest Help Articles

**GENERATED**: 2025-11-27
**PARENT**: app/public/help-center-articles/guests/

---

## DIRECTORY_INTENT

[PURPOSE]: Static HTML help articles for guests during their active stay
[PATTERN]: SEO-friendly pre-rendered HTML with shared CSS/JS
[AUDIENCE]: Guests currently staying at a Split Lease property

---

## FILE_INVENTORY

### cancel-stay.html
[INTENT]: Guide on canceling an active stay
[TOPICS]: Cancellation process, refund policies, notice requirements

---

## TEMPLATE_PATTERN

All articles follow the standard help center HTML template:
- Split Lease main header with navigation
- Breadcrumb navigation (All Collections > For Guests > Article)
- Article content with info boxes and structured headings
- Sidebar navigation for related articles
- Feedback section
- Shared CSS: `/help-center-articles/css/style.css`
- Shared JS: `/help-center-articles/js/split-lease-nav.js`
